html:
2026-0011
2026-01-09PCHFinancial Administration ActOrder directing Six Crown Corporations to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework Order directing directs the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, the Canadian Museum of History, the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, the Canadian Museum of Nature, the National Gallery of Canada and the National Museum of Science and Technology to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) to report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.N/A
subject: Order directing Six Crown Corporations to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework
precis: Order directing directs the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, the Canadian Museum of History, the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, the Canadian Museum of Nature, the National Gallery of Canada and the National Museum of Science and Technology to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) to report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.
